Text.Page:
First thing's going to be taking care of the ones we can see—those {@LinkCreature:16#2205#Stalker Company scouts}, {@LinkCreature:16#2206#warriors}, {@LinkCreature:16#2207#blademasters} and {@LinkCreature:16#2208#assassins}.

With them in the lead, it won't take long for the threat to reach Popolion. We can't have that.

Bring back those rings they wear—we'll show their friends that we can be in it for the money, too.

You've got the rings? Good, give them here.

Oh, I know just what to do with these.

Good work, .
Haven't left yet? Not scared, are ya?
